name: CLARITY_DRG
description: This table contains information for the DRG (Diagnosis Related Groups) master file.

columns.name: DRG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Diagnoses Related Group record. This is not the DRG code.

columns.name: DRG_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.
